SavedSimulation - Class in simzombie.engine
Class that structures a Simulation in a way that it can be saved Simulation IO uses this class, which saves an ordered list of SavedStep objects which relate to the individual steps of a simulation.
SavedSimulation(String, Parameters, List<SavedStep>, Map<CellReference, Cell>) - Constructor for class simzombie.engine.SavedSimulation
 
SavedStep - Class in simzombie.engine
Stores ALL the information about a single step of a simulation When stored successively (as in SavedSimulation) they can be used to recreate a simulation
SavedStep(int, List<Agent>, boolean) - Constructor for class simzombie.engine.SavedStep
 
SavedStep.StepComparator - Class in simzombie.engine
Orders steps in a list based on their step number, which is their position with a simulation
SavedStep.StepComparator() - Constructor for class simzombie.engine.SavedStep.StepComparator

shouldMove() - Method in class simzombie.engine.Agent
Method which controls whether an agent is allowed to move or not A class can override this method (which defaults to return true) to either return false (turning movement off altogether) or to return true/false conditionally

SimCanvas - Class in simzombie.engine
GUI component that displays a simulation Is back buffered for smooth animation, but requires a call to Component.repaint() to update after the simulation has been updated
